title: Organize Desktop Files
description: Analyze and organize files on the Desktop into appropriate folders
prompt:
Please help me organize the files on my Desktop by:
1. Analyzing current Desktop contents
2. Creating appropriate folders based on file types
3. Moving files into organized folders
4. Providing a summary of changes made
example:
This will:
- List all files on the Desktop
- Create folders like Documents, Images, Downloads etc.
- Move files to appropriate folders
- Show a report of what was moved where

Example output:
Moved:
- 3 PDFs → Documents
- 5 images → Images
- 2 spreadsheets → Spreadsheets
author: GooseAI Team

create_backup.description: Whether to create backup copies before moving files
